# azure-sdk-typescript

Azure SDK patterns and best practices for TypeScript/Node.js developers. Covers 24 skills spanning AI, storage, identity, monitoring, and messaging libraries.

## Install

```bash
npx skills add microsoft/skills --skill azure-sdk-typescript
```

```
/plugin install azure-sdk-typescript@skills
```

## Skills

| Skill | Package / Focus |
|-------|----------------|
| `azure-ai-contentsafety-ts` | Content Safety |
| `azure-ai-document-intelligence-ts` | Document Intelligence |
| `azure-ai-projects-ts` | AI Foundry Projects |
| `azure-ai-translation-ts` | Translation |
| `azure-ai-voicelive-ts` | Voice Live |
| `azure-appconfiguration-ts` | App Configuration |
| `azure-cosmos-ts` | Cosmos DB |
| `azure-eventhub-ts` | Event Hubs |
| `azure-identity-ts` | Identity / Authentication |
| `azure-keyvault-keys-ts` | Key Vault Keys |
| `azure-keyvault-secrets-ts` | Key Vault Secrets |
| `azure-microsoft-playwright-testing-ts` | Playwright Testing |
| `azure-monitor-opentelemetry-ts` | OpenTelemetry |
| `azure-postgres-ts` | PostgreSQL |
| `azure-search-documents-ts` | AI Search |
| `azure-servicebus-ts` | Service Bus |
| `azure-storage-blob-ts` | Blob Storage |
| `azure-storage-file-share-ts` | File Shares |
| `azure-storage-queue-ts` | Queue Storage |
| `azure-web-pubsub-ts` | Web PubSub |
| `frontend-ui-dark-ts` | Dark UI Patterns |
| `m365-agents-ts` | M365 Agents SDK |
| `react-flow-node-ts` | React Flow Nodes |
| `zustand-store-ts` | Zustand State Management |
